title: Non-Fiction
itunes:title: Non-Fiction
description:
The crew discuss the early beef between the Crips and Bloods, James speaks on childhood beef with Santana Block and how they were a force to be reckoned with, The Club El Rey incident and they attempt to answer if the police would use less deadly force if people simply complied. Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
